WWWSEAR1 ;WWWSEAR1;DT;SUCHEN BUTTON ANZEIGEN;05.08.1997 ; ;/------------------------------------------------------------------\ ;| Description of Function : ;| SUCHEN BUTTON ANZEIGEN ;| ;| Inputs : ;| ;| ;| ByRef : ;| ;| ;| Returns : ;| ;| ;| History : ;| ; 17-Apr-2009 shobby SR16455: Moved tag in to coolbar function. ; 24-Jan-2008 shobby SRBR014526: Call to standard Coolbar function. ;| DT 05.08.1997 ;| ;\------------------------------------------------------------------/ NEW YLKY,YLKY1,YLKY2 ;WRITE YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR SET YMENU="" IF YBED'="" SET YMENU=$PIECE($GET(^WWW013(0,YBED,1)),Y,11) IF YMENU="" SET YMENU=$PIECE($GET(^WWW012(0,YM,1)),Y,31) ;W "

" ;STANDARD VORGABEN WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" IF $GET(YAENBER)'="" WRITE YCR,"" ;TYBD;04,07,2003;23883 IF $GET(YNOKEY)'="" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR,"" ;WENN VORAB ZEITABHÄNGIGE ERFASSUNG ;when logging IF $GET(YTIMEFORM)'="" WRITE YCR,"" WRITE "",YCR WRITE YCR WRITE YCR IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,10)=1 WRITE "
" DO ^WWWUP(0) DO ^WWWKOPF($$^WWWTEXT(148)_" ("_YNAME_")") IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,10)=1 WRITE "
" ;WRITE YCR,YCR,"",YCR,YCR ;WRITE YCR,"" ;16455 IF YORIENT="" SET YORIENT=+$PIECE($GET(YSUCH1),Y,9) IF YORIENT="" SET YORIENT=0 SET YLKY2=YAUSWAHL IF +YSORT=0 IF YLKY2'="" DO ;DATUM IN KEY? ;Date within . FOR YLKY1=1:1 SET YLKY=$GET(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YLKY1,1)) QUIT:YLKY="" DO . . QUIT:$PIECE(YLKY,Y,3)'=1 ;KEIN DATUM ;no Date . . SET YLKY(1)=+$PIECE(YAUSWAHL,",",YLKY1) . . IF YLKY(1)'=0 SET $PIECE(YLKY2,",",YLKY1)=$$^WWWDATE(YLKY(1)) . . QUIT . QUIT IF +YSORT'=0 DO ;IN SORTKEY ;within . FOR YLKY1=1:1 SET YLKY=$GET(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,YLKY1,1)) QUIT:YLKY="" DO . . QUIT:$PIECE(YLKY,Y,6)'=YSORT ;FALSCHER SORT . . QUIT:$PIECE(YLKY,Y,3)'=1 ;KEIN DATUM ;no Date . . SET YLKY(1)=YAUSWAHL . . IF YLKY(1)'=0 SET YLKY2=$$^WWWDATE(YLKY(1)) . . QUIT . QUIT WRITE YCR,"" IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 WRITE "" IF YORIENT=0 DO ;NORMAL VOR ;normal pre- . WRITE "" . QUIT IF YORIENT=1 DO ;vor wenn Sort vor ;pre- when pre- . WRITE "" . QUIT IF YORIENT=0 DO ;rück wenn normal vor ;retro- when normal pre- . WRITE "" . QUIT IF YORIENT=1 DO ;rück wenn sort rück ;retro- when retro- . WRITE "" . QUIT DO ;ZURÜCK ;retro- ;back . WRITE "" . WRITE YCR . QUIT WRITE YCR IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 DO . WRITE "" . QUIT IF $GET(YSEARBIT)=1 DO ;WECHSEL SUCHMASKE;FIS;19.12.03 ;vicissitude . WRITE "" . QUIT IF YMENU=4 DO . WRITE YCR ;MENU . WRITE "" . QUIT IF $PIECE(YVOR1,Y,19)="" DO . WRITE YCR . WRITE "" . QUIT WRITE YCR ;WRITE "" IF $DATA(^WWW123(0,YFORM)) DO . SET YLFN=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,"")) . QUIT:YLFN="" ;KEINE AUSWAHL ;no Selection . QUIT:$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YLFN))="" ;WENN NUR EINE AUSWAHL QUIT . NEW YA,I,YLFN,SPRACHE,YEXEC . SET SPRACHE=$$^WWWLANGU(YBED) . SET LANGUAGE=SPRACHE . SET YLFN="" FOR SET YLFN=$ORDER(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YLFN)) QUIT:YLFN="" DO . . SET YA=$GET(^WWW123(0,YFORM,YLFN,1)) . . Q:$P(YA,Y,8)=1 ;MIT LINK NICHT DARSTELLEN ;by means of Not impersonate . . WRITE YCR,"" . . QUIT . QUIT IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 WRITE "" ;IF +$PIECE($GET(^WWW001(0,YDATEI,1)),Y,24)=1 DO ;BITMAP AKTIV . Q:$O(^WWW002(0,YDATEI,""),-1)'=1 ;MEHR KEYS VORHANDEN ;more on hand . NEW NOR . SET NOR=$$^WWWBITCOUNT(YDATEI) ;GESAMTE RECORDS . IF +$GET(NOR)'=0 DO . . WRITE "" . QUIT WRITE YCR,"" WRITE YCR WRITE YCR,"
" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 DO . . WRITE "" ; upward . . QUIT . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 DO . . WRITE "" ; upward . . WRITE "" . . QUIT . WRITE YCR,"" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 DO . . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 DO . . WRITE "" . . WRITE "" ; upward . . WRITE "" . . QUIT . WRITE YCR,"" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 DO . . WRITE "" ; down . . QUIT . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 DO . . WRITE "" ; down . . QUIT . WRITE YCR,"" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 WRITE "" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE "" ;NEU ;recent . WRITE YCR,"" . DO . . WRITE "" . . WRITE YCR . . WRITE "" ;ERWEITERTE SUCHE ;search . . WRITE "" . . QUIT . WRITE YCR,"" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 WRITE "" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 WRITE "" . IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 WRITE YCR,"" . WRITE YCR,"" ;HILFE ;IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=0 WRITE "" ;IF +$PIECE(YVOR,Y,45)=1 WRITE YCR,"" ;WRITE YCR,"" . . ;WRITE "" . . WRITE YCR,"" . . IF $PIECE(YVOR,Y,7)'="" WRITE "" . . WRITE $$^WWWTEXT(402)_": " . . WRITE NOR ;ANZAHL Datensäte ;Number . . WRITE YCR,"
